== Nenmenikkara (CT) (627920) ==

Nenmenikkara (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 10.41 sq. km. and harbouring 4397 households with total population of 18067 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 20 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 265 km. Male population is 8891 and female population is 9176. Scheduled Caste population is 1938 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 627920<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 20 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Puthukkad at a distance of 5 km.
